arcade.patch.env.lattice

Class PatchLatticeTri

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.patch.env.lattice.PatchLattice
      • arcade.patch.env.lattice.PatchLatticeTri
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Lattice, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable

    public class PatchLatticeTri
extends PatchLattice
    Concrete implementation of PatchLattice for triangular coordinates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PatchLatticeTri

        public PatchLatticeTri(int length,
                       int width,
                       int height,
                       double ds,
                       double dz,
                       MiniBox parameters)
        Creates a triangular PatchLattice environment.
        Parameters:
        length - the length of array (x direction)
        width - the width of array (y direction)
        height - the height of array (z direction)
        ds - the spatial scaling (x and y directions)
        dz - the spatial scaling (z direction)
        parameters - the dictionary of parameters
